titles: The assemblie of foules Here foloweth the assemble of foules veray pleasaunt and compendyous to rede or here compyled by the preclared and famous clerke Geffray Chaucer.
author: Chaucer, Geoffrey, d. 1400.
Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
date: The. xxiiij. day of Ianuary, in the yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC.[et]xxx. [1530]]
publisher: In Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne agaynste the condyte, by me Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Includes two poems by Robert Copland.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
